title: Introduction to BlockID Admin Console
description: BlockID Admin Console is designed to enhance the security of your corporate network and enterprise applications by eliminating login credentials (usernames and passwords) and the need for separate multi-factor authentication (MFA) solutions. It is a next-generation identity and leverages biometrics authentication and blockchain technology to verify the identity of a user who tries to access your network or applications. It is a cloud-based solution that is customizable, fully integrated with leading access management, and single-sign-on (SSO) solutions including active directory (AD).
